prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon with a bell-shaped body and vibrant green leaves.
I want a whimsical Pokemon that looks like a plant with a playful personality.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in wetlands, featuring bright yellow and pink colors.
Make a Pokemon resembling a flower with distinct facial features and a round body.
Imagine a creature that can blend into forest habitats, showcasing shades of green.

Show me an adorable grass/poison type Pokemon that has a curious and lively demeanor.
